name: Do You Wanna **** ****
content: 有时爱的旋律会洋溢于整个下午
当夜晚来临又消失不见
抱住我告诉我，你的话都是真的
Answer the question I must ask of you
关于我的要求，给出你的答案
Or do you just wanna fool around
I guarantee it will bring you down
我保证它会令你意志消沉
If you try and fool yourself
Or do you just wanna fool around
尽情享受恋人间的时光
Where love goes a fool knows
当爱远去，爱情傻瓜明白了
That the hurt can go as deep
随着时间流逝，伤痛会过去的
别许下你无法兑现的承诺
Or do you just wanna fool around
I guarantee it will bring you down
我保证它会令你意志消沉
If you try and fool yourself
Or do you just wanna fool around
And if you wanna get close to me
You can do it so easily
看看你的双眼是否饱含爱意
Or do you just wanna fool around
I guarantee it will bring you down
我保证它会令你意志消沉
If you try and fool yourself
Or do you just wanna fool around
Or do you just wanna fool around
I guarantee it will bring you down
我保证它会令你意志消沉
If you try and fool yourself
Or do you just wanna fool around
